name: House_3
_source: speak;Villager Man;I've heard that Prince Innes of Frelia is a fantastic tactician.|Grado took Renais with no trouble, but Frelia still has yet to fall.|They say it's because Prince Innes has spies reporting every move the empire makes.|At the same time, all enemy spies in Frelia are exposed and executed swiftly.|That means that none of Frelia's secrets are ever reported back to the empire.|I've never met Prince Innes, but he doesn't sound like a man you'd want as an enemy.
